halation:Contract.NAME: Contract?
DESCRIPTIONS: Would you like to form a contract with me?
A contract has been #rformed. Have fun with your new found powers!
What a shame. If you ever want to risk your life for the fate of the universe, give me a call.

halation:FieldOfFlowers.NAME: Field of Flowers
DESCRIPTIONS: While looking for a place to rest after your latest battle, you find yourself amongst a field of flowers in full bloom. NL There appears to be a shiny object just out of reach. Maybe if you tried really hard you could grab it?
Exerting all your effort, you stretch your arm as far as it will go. At the cusp of pulling a muscle, you feel a hard, metal object! You grab it and make off with the fruits of your labor.
You're too tired from your adventures to exert yourself any further. A small break amongst the flowers is just what you needed before endangering your life further.
Eager to see what lies next, you barge past the field of flowers.

halation:VampireDonuts.NAME: Vampires
DESCRIPTIONS: "Is...Is that a donut?" NL The vampires leap towards you. "Donut! Everybody, this guy has a donut!" You find yourself surrounded by a horde of vampires all chanting #g~"DONUT,~ #g~DONUT,~ #g~DONUT!"~  NL They #rscratch and #rbite amongst each other clamoring for your attention. You hand your donut to the nearest vampire. NL #g"VAMPIRES #g@LOVE@ #gDONUTS!!!!"
OPTIONS: [Give Donut] #rLose 2 AM Donut. #gUpgraded Bites #greplace your Strikes

halation:AntiShadowMachine.NAME: Anti Shadow Machine
DESCRIPTIONS: A group of strange men in lab coats spring from the shadows, blocking your path. NL "Hello there, traveller." NL The group of men @enclose@ in on you. NL "We are having... #rproblems with the shadows around here lately. The #rGoddess #rof #rDeath seems to be #p~stirring~ ." NL "Say, do you want to survive the apocalypse?"
"Very well then..." NL @CLUNK@ @CLUNK@ @CLUNK@ NL You awake, alone, feeling #pinvigorated despite the #rpain in your neck. You seem to get emotional easier...

You brandish your weapons and @barge@ your way through. NL You can hear them shouting and calling for your head. Running on and on and on, the hallways don't seem to end, but eventually, it seems like no one is around.

halation:HikoboshiSama.NAME: Tanabata
DESCRIPTIONS: You come across a ~weeping~ God laying on the floor. NL "I miss her, I miss her so much. My ~precious~ #gOrihime-sama... " NL Too awkward to confront a mourning god you try to move on with your life but... NL " @You@ @there!@ Do you know where my #gOrihime-sama is?"

You present what you found on your journey - #yOrihime-sama in the form of a #ystar. NL "My @#rLove!@ " NL The once-mourning god glows from head to toe, becoming a star of his own. He darts into your pocket and @#rBURNS@. You bear the pain, with new lovers in tow.

Sensing a moment of weakness, you take out your weapon. In his moment of weakness, the mourning god doesn't seem to notice you at all. Bringing down the fury of the Spire upon him, he lays on the ground, unable to move. As you stand over his body, he dissolves into stardust, ~~invigorating~~ you. A piercing wail can be heard somewhere in the distance, almost as if another is mourning.

halation:ShiningIdol.NAME: Forgotten Altar
DESCRIPTIONS: You place the #yGolden #yIdol upon the altar and praise it. Memories of a distant time, a different era, barrel down upon you. The joy of idols, the joy of having an ideal to chase after, all of it, comes back to you. NL You open your eyes and see your once #yGolden #yIdol ~~shining.~~
